WorkflowOutboundMessage.name: WorkflowOutboundMessage
WorkflowOutboundMessage.description: Represents an outbound message. An outbound message sends information to a designated endpoint, like an external service. Outbound messages are configured from Setup. You must configure the external endpoint and create a listener for the messages using the SOAP API.

ApiVersion.description: The API version is automatically generated and set to the current API version when the outbound message was created.

EntityDefinition.description: Required. Available in version 34.0. The entity definition for the object associated with this WebLink.

EntityDefinitionId.description: The ID of the entity containing the outbound message.

FullName.description: The full name of the associated metadata object in Metadata API.

IntegrationUserId.description: The ID of the user under which this message is sent.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package: beta deleted deprecated deprecatedEditable installed installedEditable released unmanaged

Name.description: The name of the outbound message.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace of the package containing the outbound message.
